name: Switchcraft
storyline:
Welcome to Pendle Hill, the top Academy for witches! Tucked away in the little town of Ipswich, Massachusetts, it is home to far more than its students - a dark and magical mystery is stirring that will rock the world of witches to its very core.

Lydia, an 18-year-old Pendle Hill freshman witch, has disappeared. A conspiracy is brewing and it’s up to her friend, Bailey, to get to the bottom of the magical mystery. Bailey hopes you can join her in this
mystic adventure! Using your magic matching skills, unlock a rich interactive story full of meaningful relationships, secrecy, and match 3 puzzles. In a magical journey where every decision matters, choose your path carefully and lead Bailey down different storylines, guided by witch magic.
summary: In this match 3 adventure set in a 21st-century wizarding world, you’ll meet witches who will become your closest friends… and others who may betray you! It’s up to you how your mystery unfolds.
